SELECT BM.MessageID , BM.Version , BM.FolderID , SOF.MenuID , BM.Subject , BM.BodyText , BM.RegistDate , BM.CreatorCode , BM.OwnerCode , BM.CreateDate , BMUV.UF_Value0 AS "BannerTitle" , BMUV.UF_Value1 AS "BannerSubTitle" , BMUV.UF_Value2 AS "BannerText" , IF((SELECT BUO.SortKey FROM covi_smart4j.board_userform_option AS BUO WHERE BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUO.OptionName = BMUV.UF_Value3) = 0 , 'Basic', 'Dark')AS "BannerImageOption" , IF((SELECT BUO.SortKey FROM covi_smart4j.board_userform_option AS BUO WHERE BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUO.OptionName = BMUV.UF_Value4) = 0 , 'Y', 'N')AS "BannerBoardOption" , IF((SELECT BUO.SortKey FROM covi_smart4j.board_userform_option AS BUO WHERE BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUO.OptionName = BMUV.UF_Value5) = 0 , 'New', 'This')AS "BannerOpenOption" , IF((SELECT BUO.SortKey FROM covi_smart4j.board_userform_option AS BUO WHERE BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUO.OptionName = BMUV.UF_Value6) = 0 , 'This', 'Link') AS "BannerLinkOption" , (SELECT BUV.FieldValue FROM covi_smart4j.board_userform_value AS BUV WHERE BUV.MessageID = BM.MessageID AND BUV.Version = BM.Version AND BUV.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUV.UserFormID = BU.UserFormID) AS "LinkURL" , IF((SELECT BMUV.UF_Value8 FROM dual WHERE BMUV.UF_Value8 REGEXP '^[0-9]+$') IS NOT NULL , CAST(BMUV.UF_Value8 AS UNSIGNED), 999) AS "SortKey" , SF.ServiceType , SF.FilePath , SF.SavedName , CONCAT(REPLACE(ST.FilePath,'{0}',SF.CompanyCode), SF.FilePath, SF.SavedName) AS "FullPath" FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder AS SOF INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.board_message AS BM ON BM.FolderID = SOF.FolderID LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.board_message_userform_value AS BMUV ON (BM.MessageID = BMUV.MessageID AND BM.Version = BMUV.Version) AND BMUV.FolderID = BM.FolderID LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.board_userform_option AS BUO ON BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUO.OptionName = BMUV.UF_Value3 LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.board_userform AS BU ON BU.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BU.SortKey = 8 LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_file AS SF ON SF.ServiceType = 'Board' AND SF.ObjectID = BM.FolderID AND SF.ObjectType = 'FD' AND SF.MessageID = BM.MessageID AND SF.SaveType != 'INLINE' AND SF.Version = BM.Version LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_storage ST ON ST.StorageID = SF.StorageID WHERE SOF.FolderID = #{folderID} AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND (BM.UseSecurity != 'Y' OR (BM.UseSecurity = 'Y' AND BM.CreatorCode = #{userCode})) AND (BM.ExpiredDate IS NULL OR BM.ExpiredDate >= #{localCurrentDate}) AND (BM.ReservationDate IS NULL OR BM.ReservationDate < #{localCurrentDate}) AND IFNULL(BM.SecurityLevel, 999) >= (SELECT BM.SecurityLevel FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user WHERE UserCode = #{userCode})
AND (SELECT BUO.SortKey FROM covi_smart4j.board_userform_option AS BUO WHERE BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, IFNULL(BUO.OptionName, '')) = BMUV.UF_Value9) = 0 AND BM.IsCurrent = 'Y' ORDER BY SortKey ASC, BM.RegistDate ASC

SELECT P.UserCode, P.MailAddress, P.PhotoPath FROM
SELECT #{userCode} AS UserCode
U LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user P ON U.UserCode = P.UserCode
SELECT #{userMail} AS MailAddress
U LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user P ON U.MailAddress = P.MailAddress

SELECT (SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) FROM DUAL) AS FolderName, MessageID, FolderID, `Version`, Subject, CreateDate, CreatorCode, CreatorName, UseIncludeRecentReg, RecentlyDay, MenuID, IsRead, FileID FROM ( SELECT SOF.MultiDisplayName, BM.MessageID, BM.FolderID, BM.`Version`, BM.Subject, DATE_FORMAT(BM.CreateDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CreateDate, BM.CreatorCode, IF(BM.UsePubDeptName = 'Y', Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, BM.CreatorDept), Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, BM.CreatorName)) AS CreatorName, IFNULL(BC.UseIncludeRecentReg, BCD.UseIncludeRecentReg) AS UseIncludeRecentReg, IFNULL(BC.RecentlyDay, BCD.RecentlyDay) AS RecentlyDay, SOF.MenuID, IF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_message_reader WHERE MessageID = BM.MessageID AND ReaderCode = #{userCode}) > 0, 'Y', 'N') AS IsRead, (SELECT MAX(FileID) FROM sys_file WHERE ObjectType = 'FD' AND ObjectID = BM.FolderID AND MessageID = BM.MessageID AND SaveType = 'IMAGE') AS FileID FROM covi_smart4j.board_message AS BM INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder AS SOF ON BM.FolderID = SOF.FolderID LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.board_config AS BC ON BM.FolderID = BC.FolderID LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.board_config_default AS BCD ON SOF.FolderType = BCD.FolderType WHERE 1=1 AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL AND SOF.IsUse = 'Y' AND BM.IsCurrent = 'Y' AND BM.MsgState IN ('C', 'A')
AND MsgType IN ('O', 'C', 'M')
AND MsgType IN ('N', 'B')
AND IF(SOF.FolderType = 'OneToOne', BM.OwnerCode = #{userCode} OR (SELECT OwnerCode FROM sys_object_folder WHERE FolderID = BM.FolderID) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userCode},';%') , 1=1) AND IFNULL(BM.SecurityLevel,999) >= (SELECT SecurityLevel FROM sys_object_user WHERE UserCode = #{userCode}) AND (BM.UseSecurity != 'Y' OR (BM.UseSecurity = 'Y' AND BM.CreatorCode = #{userCode})) AND (BM.ExpiredDate IS NULL OR BM.ExpiredDate >= #{localCurrentDate} ) AND SOF.ObjectType = #{bizSection} AND BM.FolderID IN
#{item}
AND CONCAT(';',#{menuID},';') LIKE CONCAT('%;',SOF.MenuID, ';%')
AND IFNULL(BC.UseIncludeRecentReg, BCD.UseIncludeRecentReg) = 'Y'
ORDER BY BM.RegistDate DESC LIMIT 6 ) AS RESULT

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CompleteList.* FROM ( SELECT B.ProcessArchiveID , A.PerformerID , A.WorkitemArchiveID , B.FormPrefix , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , A.UserCode , A.UserName , A.SubKind , A.SubKind AS FormSubKind , C.FormID , C.FormName , DATE_FORMAT(B.EndDate, '%Y.%m.%d') AS EndDate , B.EndDate AS RealEndDate , 'Complete' AS TYPE FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J_STORE.JWF_WorkitemArchive AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J_STORE.JWF_ProcessArchive AS B ON B.ProcessArchiveID = A.ProcessArchiveID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J_STORE.JWF_ProcessDescriptionArchive AS C ON B.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID = C.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID WHERE 1=1 AND A.UserCode = #{userCode} AND A.SubKind = 'T006' AND B.InitiatorID = #{userCode} AND A.Deleted IS NULL AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019','T020','T021') AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND A.PIBusinessState = '02_01' ) AS CompleteList
UNION ALL
SELECT RejectList.* FROM ( SELECT B.ProcessArchiveID , A.PerformerID , A.WorkitemArchiveID , B.FormPrefix , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , A.UserCode , A.UserName , A.SubKind , A.SubKind AS FormSubKind , C.FormID , C.FormName , DATE_FORMAT(B.EndDate, '%Y.%m.%d') AS EndDate , B.EndDate AS RealEndDate , 'Reject' AS TYPE FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J_STORE.JWF_WorkitemArchive AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J_STORE.JWF_ProcessArchive AS B ON B.ProcessArchiveID = A.ProcessArchiveID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J_STORE.JWF_ProcessDescriptionArchive AS C ON B.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID = C.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID WHERE 1=1 AND B.InitiatorID = #{userCode} AND A.UserCode = #{userCode} AND A.SubKind = 'T006' AND A.Deleted IS NULL AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T109','T020','T021') AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND A.PIBusinessState = '02_02' ) AS RejectList ) AS CompleteAndRejectList WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY FormID ORDER BY RealEndDate DESC

SELECT BM.MessageID , BM.Version , BM.FolderID , SOF.MenuID , BM.Subject , BM.BodyText , BM.LinkURL , BM.RegistDate , BM.CreatorCode , BM.OwnerCode , BM.CreateDate , BUO.SortKey AS "OpenType" , SF.ServiceType , SF.FilePath , SF.SavedName , CONCAT(REPLACE(ST.FilePath,'{0}',SF.CompanyCode), SF.FilePath, SF.SavedName) AS "FullPath" FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder AS SOF INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.board_message AS BM ON BM.FolderID = SOF.FolderID LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.board_message_userform_value AS BMUV ON (BM.MessageID = BMUV.MessageID AND BM.Version = BMUV.Version) AND BMUV.FolderID = BM.FolderID LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.board_userform_option AS BUO ON BUO.FolderID = BM.FolderID AND BUO.OptionName = BMUV.UF_Value0 LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_file AS SF ON SF.ServiceType = 'Board' AND SF.ObjectID = BM.FolderID AND SF.ObjectType = 'FD' AND SF.MessageID = BM.MessageID AND SF.SaveType != 'INLINE' AND SF.Version = BM.Version LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_storage AS ST ON ST.StorageID = SF.StorageID WHERE SOF.ObjectType = 'Board' AND SOF.FolderType = 'LinkSite' AND SOF.FolderID = #{folderID} AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND BM.MsgState IN ('C', 'A') AND BM.MsgType != 'S' AND (BM.UseSecurity != 'Y' OR (BM.UseSecurity = 'Y' AND BM.CreatorCode = #{userCode})) AND (BM.ExpiredDate IS NULL OR BM.ExpiredDate >= #{localCurrentDate}) AND (BM.ReservationDate IS NULL OR BM.ReservationDate < #{localCurrentDate}) AND IFNULL(BM.SecurityLevel, 999) >= (SELECT BM.SecurityLevel FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user WHERE UserCode = #{userCode}) AND BM.IsCurrent = 'Y' ORDER BY BM.CreateDate ASC

SELECT WebpartID , covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) AS WebpartName , Reserved AS Thumbnail FROM covi_smart4j.portal_webpart WHERE `Range` = #{cMode} AND IsUse = 'Y' ORDER BY RegistDate
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT SiteLinkID , UserCode , SiteLinkName , SiteLinkURL , SortKey , Thumbnail FROM covi_smart4j.sys_site_link WHERE UserCode = #{userCode} ) AS A
SELECT SiteLinkID , UserCode , SiteLinkName , SiteLinkURL , SortKey , Thumbnail FROM covi_smart4j.sys_site_link WHERE SiteLinkID = #{siteLinkID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.sys_site_link (UserCode, SiteLinkName, SiteLinkURL, SortKey, Thumbnail) VALUES (#{userCode}, #{siteLinkName}, #{siteLinkURL}, #{sortKey}, #{thumbnail})
mapper.select: SELECT CommentID , MemberOf , TargetServiceType , TargetID , Comment , Context , LikeCount , ReplyCount , RegisterCode , RegistDate , DeleteDate , Reserved1 , Reserved2 , Reserved3 , Reserved4 , Reserved5 , (SELECT COUNT(L.LikeID) FROM covi_smart4j.sys_like AS L WHERE TargetServiceType = 'Comment' AND CommentID = L.TargetID AND L.RegisterCode = #{userCode}) AS MyLikeCount FROM covi_smart4j.sys_comment WHERE TargetServiceType = #{targetServiceType} AND TargetID = #{targetID} AND DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY COALESCE(NULLIF(MemberOf, 0), CommentID), CommentID
